data.title: Cowtown Rodeo
data.meta_description: Pro Rodeo Hall of Fame Inductees – Class of 2023 Buy Tickets Cowtown Rodeo ~ NEXT Event Mon. 8/12 & Tue. 8/13 PRCA EXTREME BULLS!! View Full Schedule COWTOWN  RODEO…
data.text:
LOCATED IN PILESGROVE, NJ

NEXT EVENT

PRCA ~ XTREME BULLS

AUGUST 12 & 13

BE SURE TO SECURE YOUR TICKETS EARLY!

7 REMAINING PRCA Sat. RODEO NTS. to Attend this Season!

Along with Special Event ~ Xtreme Bulls

Biggest Names in Bull Riding

All XTREME BULLS Tickets $25.00

Group Sales Do Not Apply @ PRCA Xtreme Bulls

ALL PRO. BULL RIDING ~ AUGUST 12 & 13

RODEO GOES ON RAIN or INCLEMENT WEATHER!

BEWARE of 3RD PARTY RESELLERS~WE ARE NOT AFFILIATED WITH ANY OTHER SITES!!

GROUP SALES AVAILABLE AT THE GATE IF TICKETS DO NOT SELL OUT FIRST!

CHECK TICKETS FROM THE CALENDAR PAGE TO AVOID ARRIVING TO A SOLD OUT SHOW!

AVAILABLE # OF TICKETS can be viewed on the "orange button" below the calendar

TICKET AVAILABILITY AT THE WINDOW CANNOT BE GUARANTEED IF ONLINE TICKETS SELL OUT FIRST!!!

*We highly recommend printing or taking a screenshot of your tickets after purchasing online*

Honored & Proud Recipient of the Class Of 2023 ProRodeo HOF

Looking for official NJ Covid regulations? Check here for the State of NJ mandates.

This Summer come experience the history, the Americana, the thrills and excitement that is Cowtown Rodeo! Make lifelong memories when you come visit "The Best Show On Dirt" - the ONLY professional weekly rodeo in all of New Jersey!

Started back in 1929, Cowtown Rodeo has stood the test of time... remaining true to our traditions of the Old West and bringing each of you a taste of western ranching that is an integral part of American history. We are the longest running weekly professional rodeo in the USA and we hope you make plans to stop in and visit us in 2024 -- our 70th consecutive year!
